name: nuances-of-iframe-companion
description: This project is a companion to the talk presented at React India 2024 - Remote Edition. The talk was about the journey of building a live preview feature for a headless CMS and what we learned along the way.

scripts.dev: cd primary-app && npm run dev & cd secondary-app && npm run dev & cd socket-server && npm run dev
scripts.install: cd primary-app && npm install & cd secondary-app && npm install & cd socket-server && npm install
scripts.setup-env: cd primary-app && cp .env.example .env.local & cd secondary-app && cp .env.example .env.local
